raw_comment: After reading this additional information, we learned that this graph is for multiple purposes such as allergies, knowing when to plant crops, keeping us caught up on climate shifts, habitat loss or other environmental factors.
ace_sentences: One purpose of this graph is to help with allergies.
One purpose of this graph is to help people know when to plant crops.
One purpose of this graph is to keep us caught up on climate shifts.
One purpose of this graph is to keep us caught up on habitat loss.
One purpose of this graph is to keep us caught up on other environmental factors.
